issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Nodemanager should set some key information into the environment of every container that it launches.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: After YARN-561, apps don't need to set specific env variables like container-id etc. This JIRA is to track the MR part of YARN-561.
fields.summary: Update MR App to not set envs that will be set by NMs anyways after YARN-561

comments.body:
Attaching patch on behalf of Xuan.

I reviewed this as part of YARN-561 and so +1 on it.

Will commit it as part of YARN-561.

Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #3651 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/3651/])
    YARN-561. Modified NodeManager to set key information into the environment of every container that it launches. Contributed by Xuan Gong.
MAPREDUCE-5175. Updated MR App to not set envs that will be set by NMs anyways after YARN-561. Contributed by Xuan Gong. (Revision 1471156)

     Result = SUCCESS
vinodkv : http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/?root=Apache-SVN&view=rev&rev=1471156
